statements: SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, item_name FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM medical_supplies_inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_name;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, location FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity <= 20 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, quantity FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE location = 'Room A'
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Storage%'
SELECT item_name, location, quantity FROM medical_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT stock_amount, last_updated FROM stock_levels ORDER BY last_updated
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_amount < 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT inventory.id, inventory.item_name, stock_levels.stock_amount FROM inventory JOIN stock_levels ON inventory.id = stock_levels.item_id ORDER BY stock_levels.last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_id, quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT name, location FROM hospital WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM hospital WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM inventory WHERE supplier_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quantity ASC, supplier_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM hospital WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM supplies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT supply_id, quantity FROM stock_level ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE supply_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hospital WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE description LIKE '%medical%';
SELECT name, quantity, last_updated FROM stock_level ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT h.name as hospital_name, s.name as supply_name, t.quantity FROM hospital h JOIN transactions t ON h.id = t.supply_id JOIN supplies s ON t.supply_id = s.id WHERE h.location = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity < 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC, supply_name
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Medical%' AND unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM MedicalSupplies
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY supply_name ASC
SELECT supply_name, unit_price FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supply_name, quantity, manufacturer FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE unit_price < 100.00 LIMIT 5
SELECT supply_name, quantity, unit_price, manufacturer FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE supply_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price ASC
